normalised: Namaste! Big news on the renewable front, folks. India's really stepping up its game!

unnormalised: Namaste! Big news on the renewable front, folks. India's really stepping up its game!
normalised: Doctor Sharma at I I T-Delhi just announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency – reportedly boosting energy capture by fifteen percent. That's huge! Meanwhile, in Rajasthan, a new solar park spanning over five thousand acres (that's a lot of square feet!) is nearing completion. Local villagers are calling it "Surya Nagar," which translates to "Sun City." How cool is that?

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma at IIT-Delhi just announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency – reportedly boosting energy capture by 15%. That’s huge! Meanwhile, in Rajasthan, a new solar park spanning over 5000 acres (that's a lot of sq ft!) is nearing completion. Local villagers are calling it "Surya Nagar," which translates to "Sun City." How cool is that?
normalised: The project, backed by a rupee two thousand crore investment, promises to power thousands of homes and businesses. This isn't just about numbers though; it's about a cleaner future for our kids.

unnormalised: The project, backed by a Rs. 2000 Crore investment, promises to power thousands of homes and businesses. This isn’t just about numbers though; it's about a cleaner future for our kids.
normalised: Even remote villages are getting in on the action with micro-hydro projects powering schools and healthcare centers. From the Himalayas to Kanyakumari, renewable energy is becoming the new mantra. Let's hope this momentum continues! Jai Hind!

unnormalised: Even remote villages are getting in on the action with micro-hydro projects powering schools and healthcare centres. From the Himalayas to Kanyakumari, renewable energy is becoming the new mantra. Let's hope this momentum continues! Jai Hind!
